alert.note: Alert for Darke (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued July 17 at 7:02PM EDT until July 17 at 7:30PM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 730 PM EDT FOR SOUTHERN DARKE COUNTY... At 701 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Greenville, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor hail damage to vehicles is possible. Expect wind damage to trees and power lines. Locations impacted include... Greenville, Arcanum, New Madison, Wayne Lakes, Pitsburg, Hollansburg, Palestine, Union Corners, Abbottsville and Sharpeye. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. To report severe weather, go to our website at weather.gov/iln and submit your report via social media, when you can do so safely.
